casebody.data:
No. 09-150. Michigan, Petitioner v. Richard Perry Bryant. 559 U.S. 1065, 130 S. Ct. 2138,

176 L. Ed. 2d 719,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 3456. April 19, 2010.

Motion of respondent for appointment of counsel granted. Peter Jon Van Hoek, Esquire, of Detroit, Michigan, is appointed to serve as counsel for the respondent in this case.
